trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Simi Valley
There were no other sightings in Simi Valley on or around September 8th 2011
Summary: bright white starlight object hovering above simi valley nightly.
divs: Sighting Detailsbright white star-like cylinder that has been hovering over simi valley nightly since 9-01-11. on first night of sighting i seen it turn off to view the structure,and it was a cylinder shaped object that was red-hot in color,last night it was viewed dropping in elevation coming very low to ground. my estimation is 300 feet from ground. this object is viewed nightly hovering over simi valley and i have witnessed it de-sending and elivating rapidly when helicopter is in vicinity. 99% sure it can be viewed tonight. from dusk to dawn.
